errors.error_description: Uses incorrect command syntax 'gsutil --help' instead of 'gsutil help'
correction_candidates: Run the "gsutil help" command for a list of the built-in gsutil help topics.
Run the "gsutil -h" command for a list of the built-in gsutil help topics.
Run the "gsutil help topics" command for a list of the built-in gsutil help topics.
Run the "gsutil help commands" command for a list of the built-in gsutil help topics.
errors.golden_answer: Run the "gsutil help" command for a list of the built-in gsutil help topics.
